channel.title: Help With Model
channel.description:
Alright guys i started making ints for some models ive downloaded or something, and my friend asked me to make him ints for his platebody he downloaded, i tried and when i equip it, it goes wrong look heres a pic..
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/4gt9x3.png[/img]
also here are the ints. [code] if(i == 13690) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 14096; // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt181 = 1000; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 470; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 129; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 14090;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 14090;//female wearing class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Falling Plate";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Its A Falling Plate! I Think it fell out of the sky!".getBytes();//examin info }[/code]
Please help!
Thanks!*Also i dont think this is the right section, if so any mod please move it to the correct section!*

item.title: Help With Model
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Jordiescape:

Server sided, the class ‘Item’.

No bud sorry, wrong.

The problem is, the current datmaker cannot animate platebodies, or arms, therefore the arms fuck up like that, although it is possible to animate it using a Hex Editor, but they are very hard to use, and i recommend you to either give up, or wait for the little ‘project’ me and cocoa are working on to update the converter so it can animate more types of models.

Read full topic

item.title: Help With Model
item.dc:creator: @Zillionair1 Zillionair1
item.description:
@Zillionair1 wrote:

[quote=“Y Do I Need Cb?, post:1, topic:252660”]Alright guys i started making ints for some models ive downloaded or something, and my friend asked me to make him ints for his platebody he downloaded, i tried and when i equip it, it goes wrong look heres a pic…

also here are the ints.

if(i == 13690) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 14096; // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt181 = 1000; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 470; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 129; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 14090;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 14090;//female wearing class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves //Sleeves are messed up, maybe its this. class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves //Sleeves are messed up, maybe its this. class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Falling Plate";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Its A Falling Plate! I Think it fell out of the sky!".getBytes();//examin info }

Please help!

Thanks!Also i dont think this is the right section, if so any mod please move it to the correct section![/quote] Did you remember to say “add model 14090” in the game? No “::” or “/”

Read full topic

item.title: Help With Model
item.dc:creator: @Y_Do_I_Need_Cb Y Do I Need Cb?
item.description:
@Y_Do_I_Need_Cb wrote:

I do have it in server sided but it still makes that glitch, i even put it in the item and item4… still the same i dont know what the problem is… can someone help?

BTW i have it good with weapons it weilds correctly but when i add in any plate with the ints that ive made it goes wrong =[

Thanks.

Read full topic
